title: Caroline deaths confirmed as homicide, suicide
content:
CAROLINE, VA (WWBT) -
The Medical Examiner's Office says two people found dead in a Caroline home on Friday were victims of a homicide and suicide.
Tina Long-Gray died from a gunshot wound to the chest, the Medical Examiner's Office said Wednesday. Her death is being ruled a homicide. Andre Gray died from a self-inflicted gunshot wound to the head.
They were found dead in the 14000 block of Jefferson Davis Highway on Friday night. Two family members -- an 18-year-old female and 7-year-old male -- were also shot and transported to Mary Washington Hospital where they were listed in stable, but critical condition.
Caroline investigators said the shootings appear to be domestic related.
